text: The Mula is a river in Murcia, Spain. The river's source is located in Bullas.Costejà, Meritxell, et al: "Case Study 2: Mula River Basin", page 5. Euwareness Spain, April 2002. Retrieved 23 December 2009. == See also == * List of rivers of Spain ==References== Category:Rivers of Spain Category:Rivers of the Region of Murcia
title: Mula (Spain)
